page.title: 04Barclays Bank
page.content: We interviewed the manager of Barclays Bank who's name was Mr Cleary.Mr Cleary has been in banking since 1951 and has been in Cranbrook's Barclays for 8 years.Banking has changed considerably over the past few years by computers,cash dispensers,loans,and far more women are being introduced to the state banks.There are three other banks in Cranbrook.The Midland,National Westminster and Lloyds.Most of the accounts are of personal accounts followed by retail services and farming and industry,the single most important employment is education.Security is always a big consideration.The bank plays an important part in the commercial life of the town.Barclays Bank does not feel threatened by competition from rival banks or estate agents.The bank has quite a few children's accounts.
